column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Crust: Lou Malnati's takes on a close second to Giordano's for sure
column2: but barring anything else they are both essentially equal. Flaky and crispy butter crust
column3: never burnt. I will knock on the fact that typically because Lou's and Gino's has smaller pizzas than Giordano's
column4: the ratio of dough to ingredients seems to be greater. Still crispy and delicious though.
